name: GO Bhop
description: Bunny hop (bhop) - is a skill to move faster in FPS games. Turn left and right to get more speed and finish maps faster than others. Avoid walls as they slow you down. Pros will be in leaderboards (statistics). Finish maps, get coins, buy cases, spin and win cool knifes, gloves, weapons and skins. Yes you can sell stuff. Yes you can play with friends online - choose Multiplayer mode. Yes you can make private races. Enough reading - GO Bhop!
